member.summary: The text language key for the achievement.

member.name: F:SFCore.SCustomAchievement.hidden
member.summary: A flag to indicate whether or not to display the text when the achievement is not yet acquired.

member.summary: Achievement helper class for easily adding custom achievements. The mod using this needs to handle the following: - titleConvo Language string(s) - textConvo Language string(s)

member.summary: Constructs the helper, hooks needed methods.

Language key of the achievement title

member.name: T:SFCore.CharmHelper
member.summary: Charm helper class for easily adding custom charms. The mod using this needs to handle the following: - "CHARM_NAME_{ID}" Language string(s) - "CHARM_DESC_{ID}" Language string(s) - "gotCharm_{ID}" PlayerData bool(s) - "newCharm_{ID}" PlayerData bool(s) - "equippedCharm_{ID}" PlayerData bool(s) - "charmCost_{ID}" PlayerData int(s)

member.name: T:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2
member.summary: Abstract class to avoid boilerplate code. This adds easy SaveSettings and GlobalSettings functionality.

member.name: P:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2.GlobalSettings
member.summary: The global settings for this mod. The settings load will only occur once so a static field should be used to prevent loss of data

member.name: M:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2.OnLoadGlobal(`1)
member.summary: Loads the saved GlobalSettings.
member.param: The settings that are being loaded

member.name: M:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2.OnSaveGlobal
member.summary: Returns the current SaveSettings to save them to the disk.
member.returns: The settings that are going to be saved.

member.name: P:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2.SaveSettings
member.summary: The save data specific to a certain savefile. This setting will be loaded each time a save is opened.

member.name: M:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2.OnLoadLocal(`0)
member.summary: Loads the saved SaveSettings of the save.
member.param: The settings that are being loaded

member.name: M:SFCore.Generics.FullSettingsMod`2.OnSaveLocal
member.summary: Returns the current SaveSettings to save them to the disk.
member.returns: The settings that are going to be saved.

member.name: T:SFCore.InventoryPageType
member.summary: Enum to determine type of the inventory page.

member.name: F:SFCore.InventoryPageType.Empty
member.summary: An empty inventory page. See https://discord.com/channels/879125729936298015/880548951521103962/963340255661031464 for specifics.

member.name: F:SFCore.InventoryPageType.Inventory
member.summary: A shallow copy of the main inventory page.

member.name: F:SFCore.InventoryPageType.Charms
member.summary: A shallow copy of the Charms inventory page.

member.name: F:SFCore.InventoryPageType.Journal
member.summary: A shallow copy of the Hunters Journal inventory page.

member.name: F:SFCore.InventoryPageType.Map
member.summary: A shallow copy of the Map inventory page.

member.name: T:SFCore.InventoryHelper
member.summary: Helper class for easily adding new inventory pages. The mod using this needs to handle the following: - 1 name language string per page - 0 to 1 PlayerData bools per page - 0 to 1 events per item

member.name: M:SFCore.InventoryHelper.unusedInit
member.summary: Used for static initialization.

member.name: M:SFCore.InventoryHelper.AddInventoryPage(SFCore.InventoryPageType,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Action{UnityEngine.GameObject})
member.summary: Adds an inventory page with a specified original.
member.param: The original to copy
The name of the new page
The language key for the new page
The event name to use to get to the new page. Needs to be unique
The playerdata bool name that indicates wether or not this page is available
A callback so the mod can alter the given inventory page after it has been copied and made accessible

member.name: T:SFCore.ItemType
member.summary: Enum to determine type of item.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemType.Normal
member.summary: A normal item with a single PD bool to indicate whether or not the item was acquired.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemType.OneTwo
member.summary: An item with 2 PD bools to indicate whether or not one item or another was acquired, not both.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemType.OneTwoBoth
member.summary: An item with 2 PD bools to indicate whether or not one, another or both items were acquired.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemType.Counted
member.summary: An item with a single PD int to indicate whether or not and how many of an item were acquired.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemType.Flower
member.summary: An item to mimic the delicate flower. It has 2 sprites, 2 names and 4 descriptions. The item counts as acquired when playerdataBool1 is true and either of playerdataBool2 and playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) is false. sprite1 is used when playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) is false. Otherwise sprite2 is used. nameConvo1 is used when playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) is false. Otherwise nameConvo2 is used. descConvo1 is used when both playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) and playerdataBool2 are false. descConvo2 is used when playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) is true and playerdataBool2 is false. descConvo3 (nameConvoBoth) is used when playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) is false and playerdataBool2 is true. descConvo4 (descConvoBoth) is used when both playerdataBool3 (playerdataInt) and playerdataBool2 are true.

member.name: T:SFCore.ItemHelper
member.summary: Item helper class for easily adding custom items. The mod using this needs to handle the following: - 0 to 3 PlayerData bools per item - 0 to 1 PlayerData int per item - 1 to 3 name language strings per item - 1 to 4 description language strings per item

member.name: T:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item
member.summary: Data of one item.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.type
member.summary: Type of the item.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.uniqueName
member.summary: Unique name for FSM purposes.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.sprite1
member.summary: Main sprite.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.sprite2
member.summary: Alternative sprite.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.spriteBoth
member.summary: Another alternative sprite.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.playerdataBool1
member.summary: PlayerData bool.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.playerdataBool2
member.summary: PlayerData bool.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.playerdataInt
member.summary: PlayerData int, sometimes used for a bool.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.nameConvo1
member.summary: Main name language key.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.nameConvo2
member.summary: Alternative name language key.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.nameConvoBoth
member.summary: Another alternative name language key, sometimes used for a description.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.descConvo1
member.summary: Main description language key.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.descConvo2
member.summary: Alternative description language key.

member.name: F:SFCore.ItemHelper.Item.descConvoBoth
member.summary: Another alternative description language key.

member.name: M:SFCore.ItemHelper.unusedInit
member.summary: Used for static initialization.

member.name: M:SFCore.ItemHelper.AddNormalItem(UnityEngine.Sprite,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a normal item. (e.g. King's Brand) You either have it, or you don't.
member.param: Sprite for the item
Bool used to determine if the item is acquired
Language string for the name
Language string for the description

member.name: M:SFCore.ItemHelper.AddOneTwoItem(UnityEngine.Sprite,UnityEngine.Sprite,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a item of type OneTwo. (Not used ingame) You either have one, the other or none.
member.param: Sprite for the item 1
Sprite for the item 2
Bool used to determine if item 1 is acquired
Bool used to determine if item 2 is acquired
Language string for name 1
Language string for name 2
Language string for description 1
Language string for description 2

member.name: M:SFCore.ItemHelper.AddOneTwoBothItem(UnityEngine.Sprite,UnityEngine.Sprite,UnityEngine.Sprite,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a item of type OneTwoBoth. (e.g. Map, Quill and Map and Quill) You can have one, the other, both or none.
member.param: Sprite for the item 1
Sprite for the item 2
Sprite for the item both
Bool used to determine if item 1 is acquired
Bool used to determine if item 2 is acquired
Language string for name 1
Language string for name 2
Language string for name both
Language string for description 1
Language string for description 2
Language string for description both

member.name: M:SFCore.ItemHelper.AddCountedItem(UnityEngine.Sprite,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a counted item. (e.g. Rancid Egg) You either have at least one, or you don't.
member.param: Sprite for the item
Int used to determine if and how much of the item is acquired
Language string for the name
Language string for the description

member.name: M:SFCore.ItemHelper.AddFlowerItem(UnityEngine.Sprite,UnityEngine.Sprite,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a flower item. (e.g. the Delicate Flower) You have it, it can be broken, but it won't be displayed if you have it from another source and it's broken. (bool1 AND !(bool2 AND bool3)) and it will be displayed
member.param: Sprite for the 'normal' item
Sprite for the 'broken' item
Bool used to determine if the item is acquired
Bool used to determine if the item is broken
Bool used to determine if the item is from another source (e.g. Queen's Gardens flowers)
Language string for the 'normal' name
Language string for the 'broken' name
Language string for the 'normal' description
Language string for the 'broken' description
Language string for the 'normal, other source' description
Language string for the 'broken, other source' description

member.name: T:SFCore.MenuStyleHelper
member.summary: Menu style helper class for easily adding custom menu styles. The mod using this needs to handle the following: 1 language string per menu style up to 1 title logo index per menu style

member.name: T:SFCore.MenuStyleHelper.Hook
member.summary: Hook to add custom run audio.
member.param: active MenuStyles
member.returns: Tuple of: - Language string of the name of the menu style - GameObject of the menu style - title logo index (use -1 if you're not sure) - unlock key (use "" to have it unlocked by default) - array of achievement keys needed to unlock the menu style (null to have it unlocked by default) - CameraCurves of the colour correction to use when the style is used (null for default) - AudioMixerSnapshot of the snapshot to use when the style is used (null for default)

member.name: F:SFCore.MenuStyleHelper.AddMenuStyleHook
member.summary: Hook to add custom run audio.
member.returns: Tuple of: - Language string of the name of the menu style - GameObject of the menu style - title logo index (use -1 if you're not sure) - unlock key (use "" to have it unlocked by default) - array of achievement keys needed to unlock the menu style (null to have it unlocked by default) - CameraCurves of the colour correction to use when the style is used (null for default) - AudioMixerSnapshot of the snapshot to use when the style is used (null for default)

member.name: M:SFCore.MenuStyleHelper.unusedInit
member.summary: Used for static initialization.

member.name: M:SFCore.MenuStyleHelper.AddMenuStyle(System.String,UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Int32,System.String,System.String[],MenuStyles.MenuStyle.CameraCurves,UnityEngine.Audio.AudioMixerSnapshot)
member.summary: Hook to add custom run audio.
member.param: Language string of the name of the menu style
GameObject of the menu style
Title logo index
Unlock key
Array of achievement keys needed to unlock the menu style
CameraCurves of the colour correction to use when the style is used
AudioMixerSnapshot of the snapshot to use when the style is used

member.name: M:SFCore.MenuStyleHelper.AddMenuStyle(System.Func{MenuStyles,System.ValueTuple{System.String,UnityEngine.GameObject,System.Int32,System.String,System.String[],MenuStyles.MenuStyle.CameraCurves,UnityEngine.Audio.AudioMixerSnapshot}})
member.summary: Hook to add custom run audio.
member.param: Method that returns tuple of: - Language string of the name of the menu style - GameObject of the menu style - title logo index (use -1 if you're not sure) - unlock key (use "" to have it unlocked by default) - array of achievement keys needed to unlock the menu style (null to have it unlocked by default) - CameraCurves of the colour correction to use when the style is used - AudioMixerSnapshot of the snapshot to use when the style is used (null for default)
